verses.verse: <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H3772>make<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3772>made<s%> with them in <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H776>land;<s%>

The <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>temptations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> the <S%H226>signs,<s%> and <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4159>miracles:<s%>

Yet the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has not <S%H5414>given<s%> you an <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>perceive,<s%> and <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H241>ears<s%> to <S%H8085>hear,<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And I have <S%H3212>led<s%> you <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> your <S%H8008>clothes<s%> are not waxen <S%H1086>old<s%> on you, and your <S%H5275>shoe<s%> is not waxen <S%H1086>old<s%> on your <S%H7272>foot.<s%>

You have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have you <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or strong <S%H7941>drink:<s%> that you might <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And when you <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out <S%H7125>against<s%> us to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and we <S%H5221>smote<s%> them:

And we <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4520>Manasseh.<s%>

<S%H8104>Keep<s%> therefore the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them, that you may <S%H7919>prosper<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H6213>do.<s%>

You <S%H5324>stand<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> your <S%H7218>captains<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> your <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and your <S%H7860>officers,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

Your <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, your <S%H802>wives,<s%> and your <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is in your <S%H4264>camp,<s%> from the <S%H2404>hewer<s%> of your <S%H6086>wood<s%> to the <S%H7579>drawer<s%> of your <S%H4325>water:<s%>

That you should <S%H5674>enter<s%> into <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and into his <S%H423>oath,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>makes<s%> with you this <S%H3117>day:<s%>

That he may <S%H6965>establish<s%> you to <S%H3117>day<s%> for a <S%H5971>people<s%> to himself, and that he may be to you a <S%H430>God,<s%> as he has <S%H1696>said<s%> to you, and as he has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
<S%H3808>Neither<s%> with you <S%H905>only<s%> do I <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H423>oath;<s%>

But with him that <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> with us this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and also with him that is not <S%H6311>here<s%> with us this <S%H3117>day:<s%>

(For you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> we have <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H834>how<s%> we <S%H5674>came<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5674>passed<s%> by;

And you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations,<s%> and their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were among them:)

<S%H6435>Lest<s%> there should be among you <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4940>family,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7626>tribe,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H6437>turns<s%> away this <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> there should be among you a <S%H8328>root<s%> that <S%H6509>bears<s%> <S%H7219>gall<s%> and <S%H3939>wormwood;<s%>

And it <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, when he <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H423>curse,<s%> that he <S%H1288>bless<s%> himself in his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I shall have <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> I <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> to <S%H5595>add<s%> <S%H7302>drunkenness<s%> to <S%H6771>thirst:<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will not <S%H5545>spare<s%> him, but <S%H227>then<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> and his <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> shall <S%H6225>smoke<s%> against that <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H423>curses<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> shall <S%H7257>lie<s%> on him, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H4229>blot<s%> out his <S%H8034>name<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H914>separate<s%> him to <S%H7451>evil<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H423>curses<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law:<s%>

So that the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> of your <S%H1121>children<s%> that shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> you, and the <S%H5237>stranger<s%> that shall <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> of that <S%H776>land,<s%> and the <S%H8463>sicknesses<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H2470>laid<s%> on it;

And that the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> thereof is <S%H1614>brimstone,<s%> and <S%H4417>salt,<s%> and <S%H8316>burning,<s%> that it is not <S%H2232>sown,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6779>bears,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%> <S%H5927>grows<s%> therein, like the <S%H4114>overthrow<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> <S%H126>Admah,<s%> and <S%H6636>Zeboim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> in his <S%H639>anger,<s%> and in his <S%H2534>wrath:<s%>

Even <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3660>thus<s%> to <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> means the <S%H2750>heat<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H639>anger?<s%>

Then men shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3772>made<s%> with them when he <S%H3318>brought<s%> them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%>

For they <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> them, <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not, and <S%H834>whom<s%> he had not <S%H2505>given<s%> to them:

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> on it <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7045>curses<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book:<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5428>rooted<s%> them out of their <S%H127>land<s%> in <S%H639>anger,<s%> and in <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>indignation,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H5641>secret<s%> things belong to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God:<s%> but those things which are <S%H1540>revealed<s%> belong to us and to our <S%H1121>children<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> that we may <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law.<s%>
